response.overview: Prince – In Motion (2006) is an unofficial concert compilation DVD released in April 2006 in Europe, featuring a mix of live performances and music videos. The 79-minute set includes footage from Prince’s "Live at the Aladdin" concert, clips from the Purple Rain tour (including Syracuse performances), and rare music videos such as "Uptown", "Pop Life", "1999", and "Little Red Corvette" . The final track, "Shadows in the Dark", appears to be an instrumental jam from the Aladdin show. The DVD is formatted in PAL, with multicamera coverage, and fans report good audiovisual quality despite its unofficial status.  Released at a price point of around €9.99, In Motion offers a compact overview of Prince’s mid-career live presence, blending well-known hits with obscure concert material not widely available in other formats.
response.title: Prince in Motion
